room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Revenge" by Xscape Quest in Michigan City
room_address: 301 W US Highway 20, Michigan City, IN 46360
room_description:
With Captain Blackbeard’s last breath, He summoned Black Magic to place a Curse on his most prized possession, The Ancient Aztec Treasure of Cortés. Authorities have searched the ship but have been scared away by threats of the Cursed Treasure.
Rumors persist that there is undiscovered treasure still aboard but no one that has searched for it has lived to tell the tale. All men who touch the treasure spend their afterlife in Davy Jones’s Locker. We have heard a tale of a way to break the Curse.
Legend states that if the remaining Gold of the Aztec Treasure of Cortés is returned by Sundown on this very day, the Curse will be lifted and the Treasure Shall be Yours. Arrrrr Ye Ready for an Adventure?!
